meanings: the one and only friend one has
the sole survivor from the shipwreck

meanings.meaning: be well, ideally, uniquely, better, etc. placed for something/to do something

vlive.korean: 유일한... that cracks me up... 듣기 View video THE BOYZ : 🌙
4명 중에 유일한 무쌍인데 얼마나 유니크해요, 그렇죠? I'm the only one without double eyelids. That's unique, right? 듣기 View video V PICK! : [TXT] 먹을 거 주는 사람 좋은 사람.. 귀여운 사람 더 좋은 사람..🦊 (YEONJUN’s communicating&eating V)
vlive.english: I'm the only one without double eyelids. That's unique, right?

vlive.korean: [게임의 룰을 이해한 유일한 2인...] 지민이 누구야? [The only two who understood the rule] Who's Jimin's tagger? 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2019 - EP.88
vlive.english: [The only two who understood the rule] Who's Jimin's tagger?

vlive.korean: 유일한 사람이 되면 이미 최고는 따라올 것 같고 좀... If I become the one and only, I guess I would be the best, too. 듣기 View video TOMORROW X TOGETHER : 연주니즈한테 물어봐
vlive.english: If I become the one and only, I guess I would be the best, too.

vlive.korean: 일단은 팀 내에서 유일한 친구잖아요 그렇죠? First of all, you're the only one who is the same age with me in the team. 듣기 View video OSEN : ITZY 있지, 결국 눈물을 흘린 멤버는? #스타로드 마지막회
vlive.english: First of all, you're the only one who is the same age with me in the team.

examples.korean: The eldest son is the family’s sole provider. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 장남이 그 가족의 유일한 부양자이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The eldest son is the family’s sole provider. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: A plain necklace was her only adornment. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 수수한 목걸이 하나가 그녀의 유일한 장신구였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A plain necklace was her only adornment. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Going to the theatre is our only extravagance. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 극장에 가는 것은 우리의 유일한 사치이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Going to the theatre is our only extravagance. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: My only gripe about the hotel was the food. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 호텔에 대한 나의 유일한 불만은 음식이었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
